TopicTitle: Is your plane too big for the runway in career mode? No problem! Do this

Articles.Content:
In career mode you need to improvise sometimes, like when the runway isn't upgraded for your planes, so you do this

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Nsg5ZmuZlCQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

That framerate tho.

Rotate the plane 180\* in the VAB so the inevitable doesn't inevitably happen. You will hit the VAB.

> That framerate tho.
> Rotate the plane 180\* in the VAB so the inevitable doesn't inevitably happen. You will hit the VAB.

Yeah, 2.0 Mhz on each core, but since there's no multithreading yet... :/ I get like 14-24fps But why would I hit the VAB? I turned around to take off towards the sea
maybe unlock steering on the front gear as well

Couldn't help but notice that the tank on the other side of the launch pad was destroyed, was that a previous mishap from taking off like that? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
